alert.note: Alert for Saratoga; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 2:23AM EST until December 20 at 4:55PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Fort Edward. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Minor flood stage. At 27.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. Water floods River Road in Northumberland and reaches camps in Lake Luzerne. It may also result in flooding in Stillwater. Water is over the concrete wall at the Fort Edward Yacht Basin and several homes nearby have water approaching them. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 26.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 23.4 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Fort Edward Flood Stage: 26.0 Observed Stage at Wed 2 am: 26.5 Forecast: Wed 7 am 26.2 Wed 1 pm 25.9 Wed 7 pm 25.5 Thu 1 am 25.1 Thu 7 am 24.8 Thu 1 pm 24.5 Thu 7 pm 24.2 Fri 1 am 23.9 Fri 7 am 23.7 Fri 1 pm 23.4 Fri 7 pm MSG &&
